document_data.mainbody:
The '''''Evise Jhontil''''' was an [[artifact]] of the clergy of [[Set]]. In the {{yearlinkName|976}}, it was moved to [[Lliiress]], where it was used by the [[blue dragon]] [[Gerinvioch]]
to trap the entire population in a bubble where casting spells would kill its users.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|174-178}}
document_data.Description: The ''Evise Jhontil'' was shaped like a diamond, standing nearly four feet long and two wide. Its shape was octagonal. While operating in [[Lliiress]], it spun continuously, and blinking orange lights danced around it, faster the more magic that was used in its vicinity.
document_data.Reputation:
Gerinvioch demanded the ''Evise Jhontil'' of Aniolon Gruanthe in exchange for his protection in {{yearlink|976}}.
In {{yearlink|1372}}, the reputation of the Evise Jhontil was such that Kinase Bronihim sought the dragon for it.{{cite book/Realms of the Dragons II/Freedom's Promise|157-160}}
